description:
Since Yona is the only princess of a grand kingdom, she has been raised with great care by her doting father and protected by her childhood friend/guard Hak and others. However, her fate changes on her 16th birthday, when her beloved cousin Soo-won murders her father to claim the throne. She flees the castle to Hak's hometown and begins her new life.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Pirates
tags.description: Prominently features sea-faring adventurers branded as criminals by the law.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

node.description: Akiko Shikata is a singer-songwriter and composer. She was born in Tokyo, Japan.  She's known for her contribution in the video game series Ar Tonelico and Shadow Hearts.  She also gave her contribution on Umineko no Naku Koro ni musics, such as the OP Theme for the Visual Novel and the Anime.  Recently she released her second maxi single, Inori no Kanata, that is Tales of Symphonia TETHE'ALLA Hen ED Theme.  She sings in multiple languages such as Italian, German, English, Celtic and Hymmnos, Ar Tonelico's Official Language.

She also gave her contribution on Umineko no Naku Koro ni musics, such as the OP Theme for the Visual Novel and the Anime.  Recently she released her second maxi single, Inori no Kanata, that is Tales of Symphonia TETHE'ALLA Hen ED Theme. [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KusanagiMizuho)

Assorted bio facts from Mugen Spiral, Vol. 1:
* "(I sort of just came up with a pen name.)
* "Hobbies: I guess, drawing!   "And I also have a super fetish for voices. I love voice actors. I also really like actors with good voices.  I'm like a little follower.
* "Fave Food: I love ramen.  I wish I could go around just trying different foods. (But my stomach is small so there goes that idea.) I basically eat a lot of vegetables.  I'm not so good with meat.
* "Fave Movies: Anything Miyazaki. (I'm worried about his health. I just love him!) Sound of Music. Lord of the Rings."
Michiyuki Honma is a planner and producer.
**Hiroyasu Oyama** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/安田猛_(ブシロード%29)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [photographer](https://anilist.co/staff/220867/)._
